sentences.en: At their approach the little boy scurried away and hid.
sentences.cn: 他们走近时，小男孩急忙跑开藏了起来。

sentences.en: away with poverty!.
sentences.cn: 滚开，贫穷！。

sentences.en: Dinah was crying as she drove slowly away.
sentences.cn: 黛娜一边哭一边慢慢地开车走了。

sentences.en: Don't think it hasn't torn me apart to be away from you.
sentences.cn: 不骗你，离开你让我痛苦万分。

sentences.en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentences.cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentences.en: Go away!
sentences.cn: 走开！

sentences.en: He cleaned the flakes away with his coat sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他用大衣袖子把碎屑掸掉。

sentences.en: He noticed that fabric was tearing away from the plane's wing.
sentences.cn: 他注意到机翼在一块一块地断裂。

sentences.en: He wiped away the blood with a paper napkin.
sentences.cn: 他用纸巾将血迹擦去。

sentences.en: Her bed was crisply made, her clothes put away.
sentences.cn: 她的床收拾得很整洁，衣服也收起来了。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I stared at the man, couldn't tear my eyes away.
sentences.cn: 我盯着那个人看，视线无法移开。

sentences.en: I wanted a divorce. I wanted to get away.
sentences.cn: 我想离婚，以求解脱。

sentences.en: In prison they'd taken away his watch and everything he possessed.
sentences.cn: 在监狱，他们把他的手表和其他一切东西都搜走了。

sentences.en: Jim Coulters will mind the store while I'm away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候吉姆·库尔特斯会照看店铺的。

sentences.en: Kate is away on holiday.
sentences.cn: 凯特去度假了。

sentences.en: Leshka waved him away with a show of irritation.
sentences.cn: 廖什克恼火地挥手让他离开。

sentences.en: Simon is away with flu.
sentences.cn: 西门得了流感，没来。

sentences.en: Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentences.cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

sentences.en: Water in the engine compartment is sucked away by a hose.
sentences.cn: 发动机舱里的水由一条软管抽走。

trans.tran_cn: 离开，向另一边，在别处，（时间、空间）相距，放到，消失，一直，移开，（比赛）在客场
trans.tran_en: used to say that someone leaves a place or person, or stays some distance from a place or person
